columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: NetworkMessageId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the email, generated by Microsoft 365

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Full URL in the email subject, body, or attachment

columns.name: UrlDomain
columns.description: Domain name or host name of the URL

columns.name: UrlLocation
columns.description: Indicates which part of the email the URL is located

columns.name: ReportId
columns.description: Event identifier based on a repeating counter...
